caption:
“Faith grows in the soil of solitude.”

Reflection:
Alone with God, the heart finds its roots. Solitude is not absence but communion unbroken by distraction.

Commentary:
This reflection shows that isolation can become sacred space. In solitude, faith matures — not in crowds, but in quiet encounter.
